data.title: Arroyo Grande climate: Weather Arroyo Grande & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Arroyo Grande

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Arroyo Grande

>>average temperature by month Arroyo Grande

>>Weather Arroyo Grande

The climate here is considered warm and temperate. The winter months are much rainier than the summer months in Arroyo Grande. This location is classified as Csc by Köppen and Geiger. The mean yearly temperature observed in Arroyo Grande is recorded to be 15.0 °C | 59.0 °F. The rainfall here is around 436 mm | 17.2 inch per year.

Arroyo Grande is located in the northern hemisphere. The balmy days of Summer commence at the end of June and conclude in September. This period encompasses the months: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Arroyo Grande

In July, the precipitation level plummets to a mere 1 mm | 0.0 inch. This month holds the title for being exceptionally arid. Most of the precipitation here falls in January, averaging 99 mm | 3.9 inch.

average temperature by month Arroyo Grande

The month of highest temperature is September during which the average temperature reaches up to 18.6 °C | 65.4 °F. January is the coldest month, with temperatures averaging 11.6 °C | 52.9 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Arroyo Grande

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 98 mm | 4 inch. Throughout the year, temperatures vary by 6.9 °C | 12.5 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is February (74.46 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is October (68.20 %). The wettest month is February (8.13 days). The driest month is August (0.17 days).

Arroyo Grande weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Arroyo Grande

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In this location, the month that receives most sunshine is June, with a mean number of daily hours being 10.43. Across the entire duration of said calendar period there are an aggregate total of 323.22 hours' worth of sunlight.

In Arroyo Grande, the month that experiences the least number of daily sunshine hours is January with an average duration of 7.56 hours per day. The total amount of sunlight recorded during this period in question stands at a sum total of 234.42.

In Arroyo Grande, an average of 110.26 hours of sunshine are counted per month and around 3356.08 hours throughout the year.

Airport close to Arroyo Grande

The closest Airports of Arroyo Grande are: San Luis Obispo County Regional Airport (SBP) 14.16km,Santa Maria Public Airport (SMX) 26.65km,Santa Barbara Municipal Airport (SBA) 102.79km

You can reach Arroyo Grande from this Cities by Plane: Las Vegas (LAS), Denver (DEN)
